page.title: 06COUNTESTHORPE-FOOD/DRINK
page.content:
Our survey to find out what kind of food children in Countesthorpe eat: We found out that most have cereals for breakfast,that is probably because children don't leave themselves time for a big breakfast in the morning. And 30% don't have breakfast at all.
50% of the children have chips as their main food.This isn't surprising because there are 2 chip shops in the area. 90% of the children didn't have to go out for their food every day, having a freezer to store it. Apart from water, Coca Cola and lemonade are the main drinks.
In my opinion this is a disgusting diet.
